Html:
I have some unused citations that I want to remove from the Bibliography. The macro given in http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles_FAQ#Q11 does not work on Word for Mac 2011.

Is there a workaround?

Thanks.

The same happens on my PC with the Macro CitationsToStaticText()
This macro doesn't for the styles that I downloaded from this websyte while it perfectly works with the default styles of word.
did you also notice this? did you find a solution?
thanks
